title: vivo Y16 (4GB/64GB)
short_des: The vivo Y16 (4GB/64GB) is an affordable smartphone with impressive features. It has 4GB RAM and 64GB storage, allowing for smooth multitasking and ample space for your files. The device sports a 6.35-inch IPS LCD display, providing vibrant visuals.
